Wow, I just imagined how they would look like, it would have the
signature jagged edge design...each package filled with
multicolored/flavored Shinsengummies, with complimentary temporary
makoto tattoos, and a contest to vote for the next Shinsengummy color
for Nagakura.

PMK Saitou...since soba flavor may be a bit hard to replicate, I'd
settle for seaweed flavor

gummy RK Saitou would be an attractive neon blue color and therein
lies the trap...it would be Tylenol flavored

Hijikata DEFINATELY black licorice

Kenshin...wild cherry

Blonde Ninja girl...bubblegum

Tatsu...salty (for all those tears he cries)

Okita...watermelon

Shishio...crunchy charcoal

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "nakkinomiko12" <LMTame@w...> wrote:
> Okay, this is totally silly, but my husband and I were chatting
about the fact that they'll make *anything* into gummy candy these
days, and then he came up with a completely evil idea: 
Shinsengummies.  (For the record, I thwapped him upside the head for
this.)  
> 
> Anyway, if there really were Shinsengummy candy, what flavor would
Saitou be?
> 
> --L.
